member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.C1Mapper
member.summary: Provides functionality that allows to use the C1.WPF.Maps.C1Maps control to generate maps in reports.
C1Mapper

member.name: M:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.C1Mapper.DoCenterAndZoom
member.summary: Centers and zooms the map based on owner settings (including auto zoom/center).

member.name: M:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.C1Mapper.GetImage(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Gets a System.Drawing.Image representing the current map.
member.param: The horizontal resolution of the image.
The vertical resolution of the image.

member.name: M:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.C1Mapper.UpdateKmlLayer(System.String,System.IO.Stream,C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.AddingKmlItemDelegate)
member.summary: Adds a layer created from the specified KML stream.
member.param: The new layer name (must be a valid alphanumeric name).
The callback to invoke for each KML item as it is being loaded.

member.name: M:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.C1Mapper.ClearMarks
member.summary: Clears all previously added marks and lines. (Does not affect KML layers.)

member.name: M:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.C1Mapper.DistancePix(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates screen distance (in 96dpi pixels) between two points.

member.name: M:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.C1Mapper.DrawPoint(System.String,System.Double,System.Double,System.String,System.Drawing.Font,System.Drawing.Color,C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.MarkerShape,System.Double,System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Adds a point.

member.name: M:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.C1Mapper.DrawLine(System.String,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Drawing.Color,C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.DashStyle,System.Double)
member.summary: Adds a line to the lines layer.

member.summary: Adds a line to the lines layer.

member.name: M:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.C1Mapper.InitializeComponent
member.summary: InitializeComponent

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.GeocoderGoogle
member.summary: Geocoder that uses Google geocoding services.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.GeocoderBase
member.summary: Abstract base class used for the GeocoderGoogle and GeocoderBing classes.
member.remarks: This class manages a file-based location cache. The actual geocoding must be performed on derived classes that implement the GetLocation method.

member.name: M:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.GeocoderBase.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of a .
member.param: Name of cache file where locations are persisted.

member.name: M:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.GeocoderBase.GetLocation(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the location of a given object.
member.returns: A that represents the location of the given address.
member.remarks: The X and Y values of the point returned represent the longitude and latitude of the address.

member.name: M:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.GeocoderBase.GeoLocateAddress(System.String)
member.summary: Call geocoding service to retrieve the location of an address.

returns.para: A where the X and Y values represent the Longitude and Latitude of the given .
If the address cannot be located, the point returned has X and Y values set to double.NaN.

member.name: M:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.GeocoderBase.LoadCache
member.summary: Loads the location cache from the default cache file..

member.name: M:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.GeocoderBase.SaveCache
member.summary: Saves the current location cache to the default cache file.

member.name: M:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.GeocoderBase.UrlEncode(System.String)
member.summary: Same as HttpUtility.UrlEncode, but without taking a dependency on System.Web.

member.name: M:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.GeocoderGoogle.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of a .
member.param: Name of cache file where locations are persisted.

member.name: M:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.GeocoderGoogle.GeoLocateAddress(System.String)
member.summary: Call Google to geocode an address.

returns.para: A where the X and Y values represent the Longitude and Latitude of the given .
If the address cannot be located, the point returned has X and Y values set to double.NaN.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.GeocoderGoogleOld
member.summary: As of Jan 2015, this does not work anymore.

member.name: M:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.GeocoderGoogleOld.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of a .
member.param: Name of cache file where locations are persisted.

member.name: M:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.GeocoderGoogleOld.GeoLocateAddress(System.String)
member.summary: Call Google to geocode an address.

returns.para: A where the X and Y values represent the Longitude and Latitude of the given .
If the address cannot be located, the point returned has X and Y values set to double.NaN.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.GeocoderBing
member.summary: Geocoder that uses Bing geocoding services.

member.name: M:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.GeocoderBing.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of a .
member.param: Name of cache file where locations are persisted.
Bing license key used to access Bing services.
member.remarks: You can create Bing license keys here: http://www.bingmapsportal.com/.

member.name: M:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.GeocoderBing.GeoLocateAddress(System.String)
member.summary: Call Bing to geocode an address.

returns.para: A where the X and Y values represent the Longitude and Latitude of the given .
If the address cannot be located, the point returned has X and Y values set to double.NaN.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.KmlItemStyle
member.summary: Represents a style used to render KML items on a map.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.MapStyleBase
member.summary: Abstract base class for layer style types used in maps.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.MapOwnedKeyedItem
member.summary: Represents a map item with a unique immutable key.

member.summary: Abstract base class for types owned by a Map field.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.MapOwnedItemBase.BaseName
member.summary: Gets a one word description of the item type (e.g. "Layer"). Also used to automatically generate new items' names.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.MapOwnedItemBase.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the item. If specified, and the item is contained in a collection, this name can be used in script expressions to reference the item by name rather than by index.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.MapOwnedKeyedItem.Key
member.summary:
Unique string identifying the layer. May be used as the layer's name in C1Maps so should be a valid id (alpha-numeric starting with a letter).
NOTE: the set accessor is for serialization ONLY. This property must NOT be changed.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.ILegendItem
member.summary: Interface that should be implemented by objects which may be represented in a legend. It exposes properties that enable the legend to draw a representation of the object (such as a layer or a style).

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.ILegendItem.LegendItemKind
member.summary: Gets the kind of legend item.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.ILegendItem.LegendItemCaption
member.summary: Gets the legend item's caption.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.ILegendItem.LegendItemVisible
member.summary: Gets the legend item's visibility.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.ILegendItem.LegendItemTextColor
member.summary: Gets the legend item's text color.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.ILegendItem.LegendItemFont
member.summary: Gets the legend item's font.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.ILegendItem.LegendItemStrokeColor
member.summary: Gets the legend item graphic's stroke color.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.ILegendItem.LegendItemFillColor
member.summary: Gets the legend item graphic's fill color.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.ILegendItem.LegendItemMarkerShape
member.summary: Gets the legend item graphic's shape (for point marker item kind).

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.ILegendItem.LegendItemDashStyle
member.summary: Gets the legend item graphic's dash style (for line item kind).

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.ILegendItem.LegendItemLineThickness
member.summary: Gets the legend item graphic's line thickness in 96dpi pixels (for line item kind). Specify -1 to use the default.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.ILegendItem.LegendItemMarkerSize
member.summary: Gets the legend item graphic's marker size in 96dpi pixels (for point marker item kind). Specify -1 to use the default.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.KmlItemStyle.ItemNameExpr
member.summary: Gets or sets an expression specifying the name (caption) associated with the KML item. Set to an empty string ("") to suppress printing of item captions.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.KmlItemStyle.StrokeColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the stroke color of markers placed on the map.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.KmlItemStyle.FillColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the fill color of markers placed on the map.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.InlineKmlItemStyle
member.summary: Represents a built into a KML layer.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.InlineKmlItemStyle.Name
member.summary: Suppress showing the name in the property editor, as referencing inline styles in expressions is not possible.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.KmlItemStyleCollection
member.summary: Represents a collection of elements.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.MapOwnedCollectionBase`1
member.summary: Represents a collection of elements derived from .

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.IMapOwnedCloneable
member.summary: Interface for cloneable objects owned by a Map field.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.MapOwnedCollectionBase`1.Serializer
member.summary: Must be initialized in the static ctor.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.MapOwnedCollectionEditor`1
member.summary: Represents an editor for a collection derived from MapOwnedCollectionBase.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.KmlLayer
member.summary: Represents a map layer containing KML spatial data.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.LayerBase
member.summary: Abstract base class for map layer classes.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.LayerBase.PointsLocationExpressions
member.summary: Gets the list of lists of location expressions. The outer list corresponds to the point or points associated with each record of the layer - i.e. for a points layer, that list will contain one element, for lines - two etc. The inner list for each point is the collection of location expressions. E.g. it can be Country, City, Address.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.LayerBase.Visible
member.summary: Gets or sets the current layer's visibility.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.LayerBase.Track
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether spatial data from the current layer should be used to auto center/zoom the map.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.LayerBase.Opacity
member.summary: Gets or sets the opacity factor applied to the layer.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.LayerBase.Caption
member.summary: Gets or sets the current layer's caption. Used to represent the layer in legends.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.LayerBase.RecordSource
member.summary: Gets or sets an SQL statement used to retrieve data for the layer.
member.remarks: If provided, data is retrieved using the parent report's ConnectionString. If omitted, data is retrieved directly from the parent report. In this latter case, the data is automatically filtered according to the current grouping scope (e.g. a layer in a 'Category' group header would contain data only for the current category).

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.KmlLayer.varItemName
member.summary: The string "kmlItemName" used in KmlLayer's expressions will be replaced with the actual quoted KML item name at runtime prior to expression's evaluation. E.g. the following expression could be used to check for the country: Country=kmlItemName (note the absense of quotes around kmlName).

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.KmlLayer.Caption
member.summary: Hides Caption as KML layers cannot be represented in legends.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.KmlLayer.KmlFileName
member.summary: Gets or sets the KML/KMZ file name or network URL.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.KmlLayer.KmlFileNameXml
member.summary: Used to persist .

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.KmlLayer.EmbedKmlFile
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to embed KML data loaded from in the report definition file itself.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.KmlLayer.KmlFileData
member.summary: Gets or sets the KML file data.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.KmlLayer.ItemFilterExpr
member.summary:
Gets or sets a filter string applied to the layer's . When KML data is loaded into the layer, for each item being loaded this filter is applied to the layer data, and item expressions (, , ) are evaluated in the context of the first data row matching the filter.
NOTE: this only works if a custom is specified for the KML layer.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.KmlLayer.ItemTrackExpr
member.summary: Gets or sets an expression that determines whether a KML item's coordinates are used when calculating auto center/zoom. If this property is not specified, true is assumed.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.KmlLayer.ItemVisibleExpr
member.summary: Gets or sets an expression that determines whether a KML item is visible.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.KmlLayer.ItemStyleExpr
member.summary: Gets or sets an expression that should evaluate to an index or a name of a style in the KmlItemStyles collection that will be applied to the item. The name may refer to a style in another Map object within the report.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.KmlLayer.ItemStyle
member.summary:
Gets the default item style.
Note: the set accessor is for serialization only, and should not be used directly.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.KmlLayer.KmlFileEditor
member.summary: Specialized editor for specifying KML/KMZ files.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.LayerCollection
member.summary: Represents a collection of map layers.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.Legend
member.summary:
Represents a map legend - an area on a containing a list of items derived from . The following item types are supported:
Represents a map layer or layer style. Shows the layer's marker or line, and a descriptive text (the layer's caption by default).
Shows a color swatch, and a descriptive text.
Shows an arbitrary text.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.Legend.Automatic
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the current legend's items are automatically generated at runtime from the map's layers. If true, the collection is ignored.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.Legend.Caption
member.summary: Gets or sets the legend's caption.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.Legend.LegendAlignment
member.summary: Gets or sets the alignment of the legend within the map bounds.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.Legend.BackColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the legend's background color.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.Legend.TextColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the legend's text color.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.Legend.Font
member.summary: Gets or sets the legend text font.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.Legend.Items
member.summary:
Gets the collection of legend items. If is true, this collection is ignored.
Note: the set accessor is for serialization only.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.Legend.Margin
member.summary: Gets or sets the margin (spacing) between the legend and map edges.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.Legend.Padding
member.summary: Gets or sets the padding between the legend and items within.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.Legend.BorderThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the thickness of borders around the legend.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.Legend.Orientation
member.summary: Gets or sets the orientation of items within the legend.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.Legend.Visible
member.summary: Gets or sets the legend's visibility.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.LegendCollection
member.summary: Represents a collection of map legends ().

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.LegendItemBase
member.summary: Abstract base class for types representing items in a map legend.

member.name: M:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.LegendItemBase.OnItemSelectedInEditor
member.summary: Called by design time editor when item is selected. Allows to update readonly-ness of properties depending on values etc.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.LegendItemBase.Visible
member.summary: Gets or sets the item's visibility.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.LegendItemBase.Caption
member.summary: Gets or sets the text representing the current item in the legend.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.LegendItemBase.Font
member.summary: Gets or sets the font used to draw the current item's .

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.LegendItemBase.TextColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color used to draw the current item's .

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.LegendLayerStyleItem
member.summary:
Represents a legend item describing a map layer or a layer style.
The layer may belong to a different map in the report. This may be used to place a legend outside the map's bounds for instance.
If no layer or style is associated with the legend item, arbitrary markers, colors etc may be selected.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.LegendLayerStyleItem.LayerStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the layer or style associated with the current legend item. The layer or style may belong to a different in the report.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.LegendLayerStyleItem.TargetKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the key identifying the layer or style associated with this legend item. May be null or empty, in which case the item is not associated with any layer or style.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.LegendLayerStyleItem.Caption
member.summary: Gets or sets the caption of this legend item. May be empty, in which case the caption is retrieved from the associated layer if possible.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.LegendLayerStyleItem.GraphicKind
member.summary: Gets or sets the kind of graphic shown by the current legend item. If a layer or style is associated with this item, the value of this property is determined by it and cannot be changed.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.LegendLayerStyleItem.Stroke
member.summary: Gets or sets the stroke color used to draw the graphic shown by this legend item. If a layer or style is associated with this item, the value of this property is determined by it and cannot be changed.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.LegendLayerStyleItem.Fill
member.summary: Gets or sets the fill color used to draw the graphic shown by this legend item. If a layer or style is associated with this item, the value of this property is determined by it and cannot be changed.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.LegendLayerStyleItem.MarkerShape
member.summary: Gets or sets the marker shape used to draw point kind graphic shown by this legend item. If a layer or style is associated with this item, the value of this property is determined by it and cannot be changed.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.LegendLayerStyleItem.DashStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the line dash style used to draw line kind graphic shown by this legend item. If a layer or style is associated with this item, the value of this property is determined by it and cannot be changed.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.LegendLayerStyleItem.LineThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the line thickness used to draw line kind graphic shown by this legend item. Specify -1 to use the default.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.LegendLayerStyleItem.MarkerSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the marker size used to draw point kind graphic shown by this legend item. Specify -1 to use the default.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.LegendLayerStyleItem.GraphicKindEnum
member.summary: Specifies the kind of graphic shown by a legend item.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.LegendLayerStyleItem.GraphicKindEnum.Point
member.summary: The graphic is a point marker.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.LegendLayerStyleItem.GraphicKindEnum.Line
member.summary: The graphic is a line.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.LegendColorSwatchItem
member.summary: Represents a color swatch legend item. Shows a colored swatch along with some descriptive text.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.LegendTextItem
member.summary: Represents a text only legend item. Shows arbitrary text.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.LegendItemCollection
member.summary: Represents a collection of map legend items (types derived from ).

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.LinesLayer
member.summary: Represents a map layer containing lines, where each line connects two points on the map.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.LinesLayer.MapLocation1
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing one or more semicolon-delimited fields which may be used to determine the location of an entity using an external service such as Google. Typically these would be the fields specifying the address, e.g. "Address;City;PostalCode;Country".

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.LinesLayer.MapLocation2
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing one or more semicolon-delimited fields which may be used to determine the location of an entity using an external service such as Google. Typically these would be the fields specifying the address, e.g. "Address;City;PostalCode;Country".

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.LinesLayer.Longitude1
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of a field specifying the longitude. Ignored if is not empty.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.LinesLayer.Latitude1
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of a field specifying the latitude. Ignored if is not empty.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.LinesLayer.Longitude2
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of a field specifying the longitude. Ignored if is not empty.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.LinesLayer.Latitude2
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of a field specifying the latitude. Ignored if is not empty.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.LinesLayer.LineVisibleExpr
member.summary: Gets or sets expression determining whether a line is visible.

member.summary: Whether to auto-zoom to enclose all marks.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.IMapperOwner.MaxAutoZoom
member.summary: Gets the maximum auto zoom level. 0 means there's no limitation.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.IMapperOwner.RoundAutoZoom
member.summary: If true, automatic zoom will be rounded down to next integer. This may improve performance with some net based tile sources.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.IMapperOwner.AutoZoomPadLon
member.summary: Auto zoom longitude padding, in percent.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.IMapperOwner.AutoZoomPadLat
member.summary: Auto zoom latitude padding, in percent.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.IMapperOwner.ZoomLevel
member.summary: The zoom level, 0 being no zoom, 1 - x2 zoom and so on.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.IMapperOwner.AutoCenter
member.summary: Whether to auto-center to enclose all marks.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.IMapperOwner.CenterLatitude
member.summary: The center latitude. Ignored if is true.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.IMapperOwner.CenterLongitude
member.summary: The center longitude. Ignored if is true.

member.summary: Overridden. Loads map specific collections.

member.summary: Overridden. Saves map specific collections.

member.summary: Copies properties from another object into this object.
member.param: The source object, properties of which are copied.
Indicates whether the name of the object should be copied.

member.name: E:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Map.LayersChanged
member.summary: Fired when the Layers collection is set.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Map.GeoCachePath
member.summary:
Gets or sets the path to the file used to cache spatial coordinates (longitude/latitude) specified as MapLocation rather than actual Longitude/Latitude values. The coordinates in such cases are retrieved using an online service such as Google, and caching them significantly imporoves performance when the same location is encountered multiple times.
The path is relative to the application startup path.
The default is "geocache.xml".
Clear this value to disable caching (not recommended).

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Map.Layers
member.summary:
Gets the collection of layers containing markers, lines and KML data rendered on the map.
Note that the set accessor is only for deserialization, and should not be used directly.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Map.Legends
member.summary:
Gets the collection of legends rendered on the map. Legends may represent layers or arbitrary information (such as captions).
Note that the set accessor is only for deserialization, and should not be used directly.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Map.MarkerStyles
member.summary:
Gets the collection of styles used to render markers on the map. Styles allow markers in different layers or even in different maps to use common visual properties.
Note that the set accessor is only for deserialization, and should not be used directly.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Map.LineStyles
member.summary:
Gets the collection of styles used to render lines on the map. Styles allow lines in different layers or even in different maps to use common visual properties.
Note that the set accessor is only for deserialization, and should not be used directly.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Map.KmlItemStyles
member.summary:
Gets the collection of styles used to render KML/KMZ items on the map. Styles allow KML items in different layers or even in different maps to use common visual properties.
Note that the set accessor is only for deserialization, and should not be used directly.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Map.ToolsColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the background color of the map scale and other tools.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Map.ShowZoomTool
member.summary:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show the zoom scale.
The default is false.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Map.ShowPanTool
member.summary:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show the pan tool.
The default is false.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Map.ShowScale
member.summary:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show the map scale.
The default is true.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Map.TileSource
member.summary: Gets or sets the map tile source.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Map.AutoZoom
member.summary:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the map should automatically zoom in to just include all spatial data. Ignored (considered to be false) if AutoCenter is false.
The default is true.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Map.AutoCenter
member.summary:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether to automatically center the map around the spatial data. Note that setting this property to false effectively turns off AutoZoom.
The default is true.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Map.AutoZoomPadLon
member.summary:
Gets or sets auto zoom longitude padding, in percent relative to the viewport width.
The default is 10%.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Map.AutoZoomPadLat
member.summary:
Gets or sets auto zoom latitude padding, in percent relative to the viewport height.
The default is 10%.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Map.ZoomLevel
member.summary:
Gets or sets the zoom level value. 0 is no zoom, 1 - x2 zoom and so on. Valid values are from 0 to 20.
The default is 0. Ignored if is true.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Map.MaxAutoZoom
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum zoom level value for auto zooming. Valid values are from 0 to 20. 0 (the default) disables auto zoom limiting.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Map.RoundAutoZoom
member.summary:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether to round automatically calculated zoom levels down to next integer.
The default is true.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Map.CenterLongitude
member.summary: Gets or sets the map center longitude. Ignored if AutoCenter is true.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Map.CenterLatitude
member.summary: Gets or sets the map center latitude. Ignored if AutoCenter is true.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Map.TargetDpi
member.summary:
Gets or sets the target image resolution (dpi).
The default is 200 dpi.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Map.GeoCacheFileEditor
member.summary: Design time editor for the geocache file name.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.AddingKmlItemDelegate
member.summary: Delegate called for each KML item as it is loaded from the KML file into the map.
member.param: OUT: item stroke color (null uses color specified in the KML data).
OUT: item fill color (null uses color specified in the KML data).
OUT: indicates whether the item's coordinates should be used to auto size/zoom the map.
member.returns: True to include an item in the map, false to exclude it.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.LegendItemKind
member.summary: Specifies the kind of a legend item.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.TileSource
member.summary: Enumerates the possible map tile sources.

member.summary: Linear scale.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.ScaleType.Logarithmic

member.summary: Represents a longitude/latitude pair.
member.typeparam: The type used to represent longitude and latitude.

member.summary: Represents a style used to render point markers on a map.

member.summary: Gets or sets the name of a field specifying the caption.

member.summary: Gets or sets the shape of a mark.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.MarkerStyle.SizeExpr
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of marks placed on the map, in 96 DPI pixels.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.MarkerStyle.StrokeColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the stroke brush of marks placed on the map.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.MarkerStyle.FillColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the fill brush of marks placed on the map.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.MarkerStyle.Font
member.summary: Gets or sets the font used to draw mark captions.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.MarkerStyle.TextColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the text color of mark captions.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.InlineMarkerStyle
member.summary: Represents a built into a . Hides the style's Name as it cannot be used to reference an inline style.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.MarkerStyleCollection
member.summary: Represents a collection of marker styles (elements of type ).

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.PointsLayer
member.summary: Represents a map layer containing point markers.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.PointsLayer.MapLocation
member.summary: Gets or sets a string containing one or more semicolon-delimited fields which may be used to determine the location of an object using an external service such as Google. Typically these would be the fields specifying the address, e.g. "Address;City;PostalCode;Country".

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.PointsLayer.Longitude
member.summary: Gets or sets an expression specifying the longitude of a marker. Ignored if is not empty.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.PointsLayer.Latitude
member.summary: Gets or sets an expression specifying the latitude of a marker. Ignored if is not empty.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.PointsLayer.MarkerVisibleExpr
member.summary: Gets or sets an expression determining whether a marker is visible.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.PointsLayer.MarkerStyleExpr
member.summary: Gets or sets an expression that should evaluate to an index or a name of a style in the MarkerStyles collection that will be used to draw the marker.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.PointsLayer.MarkerStyle
member.summary:
Gets the default marker style.
Note: the set accessor is for serialization only, and should not be used directly.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.PointsLayer.ClusterDistance
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum distance (in 96dpi pixels) between markers that should be grouped into clusters. Default (0) disables clustering.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.PointsLayer.ClusterDistribution
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of cluster styles distribution.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.CustomFields.Maps.PointsLayer.ClusterStyles
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of cluster styles.
